member.name: DirectX.XAudio2CutoffFrequencyToOnePoleCoefficient

summary.para: Inline function that converts from filter cutoff frequencies expressed in hertz to the filter coefficients used with the Frequency member of the structure.
This function applies to LowPassOnePoleFilter and HighPassOnePole filter types only, use for state-variable filter types.

member.param: The cutoff frequency in hertz. Frequencies greater than SampleRate are clamped to XAUDIO2_MAX_FILTER_FREQUENCY.
The sample rate of the audio data affected by the structure.
member.returns: Returns a filter coefficient for use in the structure.
